data.name: Name of planner
data.search_length_entity: Search length: Creates dynamic configuration parameter
data.end_time_entity: End time: Creates dynamic configuration parameter
data.accept_cost_entity: Accept cost: Creates a configuration parameter that turn on if cost below
data.accept_rate_entity: Accept rate: Creates a configuration parameter that turn on if cost-rate to daily average below
data.high_cost_entity: High cost: Creates a binary sensor that tell in it's the highest cost (inverse of normal)
data.starts_at_entity: Starts at: Creates additional sensors telling when next lowest and highest cost starts
data.health_entity: Adds a status entity to tell overall health of planner

abort.already_configured: Already configured with the same settings or name
